page.title: 02LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: My mum likes to be alone and to read a book or sometimes she likes to do a bit of weeding.She most likes to watch T.V.when my brother and I arenÂ£t around.My dad likes to listen to classical records or he reads a book. Also sometimes he likes to do a bit of gardening or he likes to do some of his work for the colliery.He mostly likes to have a game of golf at Lakeside Country Club.My brother likes to draw things or occasionally he has a swim in our swimming pool in the Summer.I like to play with my Space Lego and I often have a swim in the Summer.I also like to pretend making army guns and bombs,and my brother and I play on our computer.
